levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(三)

examples.english: I hate doing homework on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我討厭在週末寫作業。

examples.english: She really hates it when her friends are late.
examples.chinese: 她真的很討厭她的朋友遲到。

examples.english: My little brother hates eating green vegetables.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟討厭吃綠色蔬菜。

examples.english: My mom sells beautiful flowers at her shop.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽在她的店裡賣美麗的花。

examples.english: Many students like these pens, so they sell well.
examples.chinese: 很多學生喜歡這些筆，所以它們賣得很好。

examples.english: We will sell our old car next month.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月將會賣掉我們的舊車。

examples.english: I like to play basketball, and I also like to swim.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡打籃球，我也喜歡游泳。

examples.english: My brother likes pizza. I also like pizza a lot.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥喜歡披薩。我也很喜歡披薩。

examples.english: The new teacher is kind. She also teaches very well.
examples.chinese: 新老師很親切。她也教得很好。

examples.english: I only ate pizza once last month.
examples.chinese: 我上個月只吃了一次披薩。

examples.english: This old house was once a school.
examples.chinese: 這棟老房子以前曾經是一所學校。

examples.english: Once you finish your homework, you can watch TV.
examples.chinese: 一旦你寫完作業，就可以看電視了。

examples.english: I brush my teeth twice every day.
examples.chinese: 我每天刷牙兩次。

examples.english: My brother is twice as tall as his little sister.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥是他小妹妹的兩倍高。

examples.english: She went to the library twice last week.
examples.chinese: 她上週去了圖書館兩次。

examples.english: The capital city of Taiwan is Taipei.
examples.chinese: 台灣的首都城市是台北。

examples.english: She wants a piece of cake for dessert.
examples.chinese: 她想要一塊蛋糕當作甜點。

examples.english: We heard the sound of the rain outside.
examples.chinese: 我們聽到外面下雨的聲音。

examples.english: This park is a beautiful place for a picnic. (這個公園是個野餐的好地方。)
My friend's place is near the school, so I often visit. (我朋友的住處在學校附近，所以我常去拜訪。)
We visited many interesting places during our trip to Kenting. (我們去墾丁旅行時，參觀了許多有趣的地方。)
The main road goes straight to the city center.
examples.chinese: 這條主要道路直通市中心。

examples.english: Be careful; the road is very wet after the rain.
examples.chinese: 小心；雨後道路非常濕滑。

examples.english: The road to becoming a doctor is very long and challenging.
examples.chinese: 成為醫生的路途非常漫長且充滿挑戰。

examples.english: Yesterday, my family went to a famous temple in the mountains.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我的家人去了山上的一座著名寺廟。

examples.english: The temple is a peaceful place for people to meditate.
examples.chinese: 寺廟是一個讓人們靜心冥想的寧靜地方。

examples.english: When you enter the temple, remember to take off your shoes.
examples.chinese: 當你進入寺廟時，記得要脫鞋。

examples.english: We will go to the museum to see the dinosaur bones.
examples.chinese: 我們將去博物館看恐龍骨頭。

examples.english: A museum is a place where we can learn about history.
examples.chinese: 博物館是我們學習歷史的地方。

examples.english: I found the science museum very exciting yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天覺得科學博物館非常刺激有趣。

examples.english: We stayed in a comfortable hotel during our trip to Kenting.
examples.chinese: 我們墾丁之旅住在一間舒適的旅館。

examples.english: Is there a good hotel near the Taipei 101 building?
examples.chinese: 台北101大樓附近有好的飯店嗎？

examples.english: This hotel has a beautiful swimming pool and a nice restaurant.
examples.chinese: 這間飯店有一個漂亮的游泳池和一間很棒的餐廳。

examples.english: My favorite season is summer because I can swim.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的季節是夏天，因為我可以游泳。

examples.english: Taiwan has a long rainy season every year.
examples.chinese: 台灣每年都有很長的梅雨季節。

examples.english: The leaves change color beautifully in the autumn season.
examples.chinese: 樹葉在秋季會美麗地變色。

examples.english: The tree is very high, almost touching the clouds.
examples.chinese: 這棵樹非常高，幾乎要碰到雲了。

examples.english: Taiwan often has high temperatures in summer.
examples.chinese: 台灣夏天常有高溫。

examples.english: The students were in high spirits for the field trip.
examples.chinese: 學生們都對戶外教學興致很高。

examples.english: In autumn, the leaves on the trees turn red and yellow.
examples.chinese: 秋天時，樹上的葉子會變成紅色和黃色。

examples.english: Last autumn, we went to the farm to pick apples.
examples.chinese: 去年秋天，我們去了農場採蘋果。

examples.english: Next autumn, I want to travel to see the beautiful leaves.
examples.chinese: 下個秋天，我想要去旅行看美麗的葉子。

examples.english: It is snowing outside right now, so it's cold.
examples.chinese: 外面現在正在下雪，所以很冷。

examples.english: I love to play in the soft snow.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡在柔軟的雪中玩耍。

examples.english: It often snows in winter in this city.
examples.chinese: 這座城市冬天經常下雪。

examples.english: Let's build a snowman together after it snows.
examples.chinese: 讓我們在下雪後一起堆一個雪人吧。

examples.english: Look! There is a cute snowman in the park.
examples.chinese: 看！公園裡有一個可愛的雪人。

examples.english: The snowman slowly melted under the warm sun.
examples.chinese: 那個雪人在溫暖的陽光下慢慢融化了。

examples.english: My plan is to finish my homework before dinner.
examples.chinese: 我的計畫是在晚餐前完成功課。

examples.english: We plan to visit the museum next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我們計畫下週六去參觀博物館。

examples.english: She has a good plan for her summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 她為她的暑假有個很好的計畫。

examples.english: Could you please tell me what today's date is?
examples.chinese: 你能告訴我今天是幾月幾號嗎？

examples.english: Please write down the correct date on the paper.
examples.chinese: 請在紙上寫下正確的日期。

examples.english: Remember to check the expiration date on the food.
examples.chinese: 記得檢查食物上的有效日期。

examples.english: We often give gifts to our fathers on Father's Day.
examples.chinese: 我們常在父親節送禮物給爸爸。

examples.english: I want to make a special card for my dad on Father's Day.
examples.chinese: 我想在父親節為爸爸做一張特別的卡片。

examples.english: Happy Father's Day! We should always appreciate our dads.
examples.chinese: 父親節快樂！我們應該永遠感謝我們的爸爸。

examples.english: My aunt lives in the USA and sends us postcards.
examples.chinese: 我的阿姨住在美國，還會寄明信片給我們。

examples.english: Many famous movies come from the USA.
examples.chinese: 許多著名的電影都來自美國。

examples.english: Next summer, we plan to visit the USA for a family trip.
examples.chinese: 明年夏天，我們計畫去美國進行一次家庭旅行。

examples.english: My mom has many old photos in her album.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽的相簿裡有許多舊照片。

examples.english: My sister likes to take photos of flowers in the garden.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐喜歡在花園裡拍花的照片。

examples.english: We saw some amazing photos of the trip on his phone.
examples.chinese: 我們在他的手機上看到一些很棒的旅行照片。

examples.english: Do you mind if I open the window a little?
examples.chinese: 你介意我開一點窗戶嗎？

examples.english: My mind was full of exciting new ideas.
examples.chinese: 我的腦中充滿了令人興奮的新點子。

examples.english: Please mind the gap when you get off the train.
examples.chinese: 下火車時請注意月台與車廂間的空隙。

examples.english: My parents work hard every day to support our family.
examples.chinese: 我的父母每天努力工作來支持我們的家庭。

examples.english: I have a lot of school work to finish before tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天前有很多學校作業要完成。

examples.english: The Mona Lisa is a famous work of art in France.
examples.chinese: 蒙娜麗莎是法國一件著名的藝術作品。

examples.english: Daily exercise makes your body strong and healthy.
examples.chinese: 每天運動讓你的身體強壯又健康。

examples.english: You should exercise at least three times a week.
examples.chinese: 你一週應該至少運動三次。

examples.english: We must finish these math exercises by tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們必須在明天前完成這些數學練習。

examples.english: A turtle can swim very fast in the ocean.
examples.chinese: 一隻海龜可以在海洋中游得很快。

examples.english: The turtle has a hard shell to protect itself.
examples.chinese: 海龜有一個堅硬的殼來保護自己。

examples.english: When turtles are young, they are very small.
examples.chinese: 當海龜還小時，牠們非常小。

examples.english: You need to practice English every day to get better.
examples.chinese: 你需要每天練習英文才能進步。

examples.english: Daily practice is important for learning a new language.
examples.chinese: 每天的練習對學習新語言很重要。

examples.english: It is good practice to finish your homework early.
examples.chinese: 早點完成作業是個很好的習慣。

examples.english: The students had a running race on Sports Day.
examples.chinese: 學生在運動會上進行了一場跑步競賽。

examples.english: Can you race me to the finish line?
examples.chinese: 你能跟我賽跑到終點線嗎？

examples.english: They will race their boats across the lake.
examples.chinese: 他們將會駕船橫渡湖面進行競賽。

examples.english: Our school's basketball team practices every day.
examples.chinese: 我們學校的籃球隊每天練習。

examples.english: To finish the project, we must work as a team.
examples.chinese: 為了完成這個專案，我們必須以團隊合作。

examples.english: The clean-up team finished their work quickly.
examples.chinese: 清理小組很快地完成了他們的工作。

examples.english: Solving this math problem needs careful thinking.
examples.chinese: 解決這個數學問題需要仔細思考。

examples.english: There is a problem with my computer; it won't turn on.
examples.chinese: 我的電腦有個毛病，它開不了機。

examples.english: Eating too much candy can cause health problems.
examples.chinese: 吃太多糖可能會導致健康問題。

examples.english: Your big toe is the largest toe on your foot.
examples.chinese: 你的大腳趾是你腳上最大的腳趾。

examples.english: I accidentally stubbed my toe on the table.
examples.chinese: 我不小心把腳趾踢到桌子了。

examples.english: She was covered in mud from head to toe.
examples.chinese: 她全身從頭到腳都沾滿了泥巴。

examples.english: What kind of music do you like to listen to?
examples.chinese: 你喜歡聽哪一種音樂？

examples.english: There are many different kinds of fruits in Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 台灣有許多不同種類的水果。

examples.english: This is a special kind of dog from Japan.
examples.chinese: 這是一種來自日本的特殊種類的狗。

examples.english: She started learning to play the violin last year.
examples.chinese: 她去年開始學拉小提琴。

examples.english: The violin makes beautiful music in the orchestra.
examples.chinese: 小提琴在管弦樂團中奏出美妙的音樂。

examples.english: He practices his violin every day after school.
examples.chinese: 他每天放學後練習他的小提琴。

examples.english: My brother plays the flute in the school band.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥在學校樂隊吹長笛。

examples.english: The soft music from the flute filled the room.
examples.chinese: 長笛輕柔的音樂充滿了房間。

examples.english: She wants to learn how to play the flute next year.
examples.chinese: 她明年想學怎麼吹長笛。

examples.english: My grandma made a special cake for my birthday.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶為我的生日做了一個特別的蛋糕。

examples.english: He has a special talent for drawing anime characters.
examples.chinese: 他在畫動漫人物方面有特別的天賦。

examples.english: This restaurant offers a special lunch set every Tuesday.
examples.chinese: 這家餐廳每週二都會提供特別的午餐套餐。

examples.english: My little brother is afraid of big dogs.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟害怕大狗。

examples.english: She was afraid to speak loudly in front of many people.
examples.chinese: 她害怕在很多人面前大聲說話。

examples.english: I am afraid that I will miss the bus if I don't hurry.
examples.chinese: 我害怕如果我不快點的話會錯過公車。

examples.english: We bought the same book at the store yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在書店買了同一本書。

examples.english: Her new dress looks exactly the same as mine.
examples.chinese: 她的新洋裝看起來跟我的一模一樣。

examples.english: My friend and I started school at the same time this morning.
examples.chinese: 我朋友和我都習慣在今天早上同一時間上學。

examples.english: These two shirts have different colors, but I like both.
examples.chinese: 這兩件襯衫有不同的顏色，但我兩個都喜歡。

examples.english: My friends and I like to try different kinds of food.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們和我都喜歡嘗試不同種類的食物。

examples.english: Today's weather is very different from yesterday's.
examples.chinese: 今天的天氣和昨天很不一樣。

examples.english: It was a very snowy day, perfect for making a snowman.
examples.chinese: 那是個下著大雪的日子，很適合堆雪人。

examples.english: The snowy mountains always look amazing in winter.
examples.chinese: 冬天時，下雪的山總是看起來很美。

examples.english: We wore thick coats for our walk on the snowy path.
examples.chinese: 我們穿著厚外套在下雪的小路上散步。

examples.english: The air in winter can be very dry.
examples.chinese: 冬天的空氣可能會很乾燥。

examples.english: Please help me dry the dishes after dinner.
examples.chinese: 請幫我把晚餐後的盤子弄乾。

examples.english: The clothes will dry fast under the hot sun.
examples.chinese: 衣服在烈日下會很快就變乾。

examples.english: My shoes got wet in the rain.
examples.chinese: 我的鞋子在雨中濕了。

examples.english: Please use a wet cloth to clean the table.
examples.chinese: 請用濕布擦桌子。

examples.english: The dog shook its body, making everything wet.
examples.chinese: 狗狗搖動身體，讓所有東西都濕了。

examples.english: Amy is popular at school because she is kind to everyone.
examples.chinese: Amy在學校很受歡迎，因為她對每個人都很好。

examples.english: This new song is very popular now.
examples.chinese: 這首新歌現在很受歡迎。

examples.english: The bubble tea shop became popular after it opened last month.
examples.chinese: 那家珍珠奶茶店上個月開張後變得非常受歡迎。

examples.english: The room was very dark without any lights.
examples.chinese: 房間很暗，沒有任何燈光。

examples.english: She has long dark hair and brown eyes.
examples.chinese: 她有著一頭長長的深色頭髮和棕色的眼睛。

examples.english: It gets dark very early in winter.
examples.chinese: 冬天很早就天黑了。

examples.english: I know the answer to this math problem. (知道)
examples.chinese: 我知道這道數學題的答案。

examples.english: Do you know the new transfer student, Lin Jia-wei? (認識)
examples.chinese: 你認識新來的轉學生林家偉嗎？

examples.english: My brother knows how to fix broken computers. (知道怎麼)
examples.chinese: 我哥哥知道怎麼修理壞掉的電腦。

examples.english: Please keep the classroom clean and tidy.
examples.chinese: 請保持教室乾淨整潔。

examples.english: If you want to improve, you must keep practicing English every day.
examples.chinese: 如果你想進步，你必須每天一直練習英文。

examples.english: My grandmother still keeps many old photos.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶仍然保留著許多舊照片。

examples.english: She wants to join the art club next semester.
examples.chinese: 她下學期想參加美術社。

examples.english: Please join us for dinner tonight at 7 p.m.
examples.chinese: 請今晚七點和我們一起吃晚餐。

examples.english: If you join the chess club, you can play with us.
examples.chinese: 如果你加入西洋棋社，就可以和我們一起玩。

examples.english: The boy threw the frisbee to his dog.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩把飛盤丟給他的狗。

examples.english: Remember to throw away the old newspapers.
examples.chinese: 記得把舊報紙丟掉。

examples.english: She threw her jacket onto the chair quickly.
examples.chinese: 她快速地把夾克丟到椅子上。

results.meaning: 打擊；撞;成功而風行一時的事物

examples.english: The batter hit the baseball right out of the park.
examples.chinese: 打者把棒球直接打出了球場外。

examples.english: The small car accidentally hit a lamppost on the street.
examples.chinese: 小車不小心撞上了街上的路燈。

examples.english: Their latest album was a big hit with young people.
examples.chinese: 他們最新的專輯在年輕人之間大受歡迎。

examples.english: My mom enjoys gardening in the backyard every weekend.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽每個週末都喜歡在後院園藝。

examples.english: We really enjoyed the movie yesterday because it was so funny.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天真的很享受那部電影，因為它太有趣了。

examples.english: I hope you will enjoy your summer vacation next month.
examples.chinese: 我希望你下個月會享受你的暑假。

examples.english: He bowed politely to his teacher in the hallway.
examples.chinese: 他在走廊上禮貌地向老師鞠躬。

examples.english: The actors bowed to the audience after their play.
examples.chinese: 演員們在戲劇表演後向觀眾鞠躬。

examples.english: We should bow to show our respect for elders.
examples.chinese: 我們應該鞠躬以表達對長輩的敬意。

examples.english: Our basketball team hopes to win the next game.
examples.chinese: 我們籃球隊希望贏得下一場比賽。

examples.english: If you work hard, you can win a scholarship for college.
examples.chinese: 如果你努力，你可以贏得大學獎學金。

examples.english: The small country fought bravely and finally won its freedom.
examples.chinese: 這個小國家勇敢作戰，最後贏得了自由。

examples.english: I want to learn English well this year.
examples.chinese: 我今年想學好英文。

examples.english: My sister learned to play the piano last year.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐去年學會了彈鋼琴。

examples.english: We learned about dinosaurs in science class today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天在自然課學到恐龍。

examples.english: The monkey likes to climb trees quickly.
examples.chinese: 猴子喜歡快速地爬樹。

examples.english: We had to climb many stairs to reach the top.
examples.chinese: 我們必須爬許多樓梯才能到達頂端。

examples.english: They plan to climb the mountain next weekend.
examples.chinese: 他們計畫下週末去爬山。

examples.english: We often hike in the mountains on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我們週末常在山裡健行。

examples.english: Our class went on a long hike last Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我們班上週六去了一趟長途健行。

examples.english: They plan to hike the trail when the weather is good.
examples.chinese: 天氣好時，他們計畫去那條小徑健行。

examples.english: We will camp by the river this summer.
examples.chinese: 我們今年夏天會在河邊露營。

examples.english: The scout leader helped us build our camp quickly.
examples.chinese: 童軍團長幫助我們很快地搭好營地。

examples.english: My sister went to a fun summer camp last month.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐上個月去了一個有趣的夏令營。

examples.english: Everyone in our class likes to play basketball.
examples.chinese: 我們班的每個人都喜歡打籃球。

examples.english: Everyone needs to help clean up after the event.
examples.chinese: 活動結束後，每個人都需要幫忙打掃。

examples.english: Everyone was excited when the teacher announced the field trip.
examples.chinese: 老師宣布校外教學時，每個人都很興奮。

examples.english: We always eat lunch together at school.
examples.chinese: 我們總是在學校一起吃午餐。

examples.english: Let's study together for the English test.
examples.chinese: 我們一起為英文考試讀書吧。

examples.english: My brother and I built a robot together.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥和我一起組裝了一個機器人。

examples.english: My brother called me five minutes ago to say hello.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥五分鐘前打電話給我說哈囉。

examples.english: We went to the park two days ago and played basketball.
examples.chinese: 我們兩天前去公園打籃球。

examples.english: She moved to Taiwan three years ago and loves living here.
examples.chinese: 她三年前搬到台灣，而且很喜歡住在這裡。

examples.english: I never forget to bring my lunchbox to school.
examples.chinese: 我從不忘記帶午餐盒去學校。

examples.english: My cat never catches mice in the house.
examples.chinese: 我的貓從不在屋子裡抓老鼠。

examples.english: I have never seen snow in Taiwan before.
examples.chinese: 我從未在臺灣看過雪。

examples.english: My dog always waits for me by the door.
examples.chinese: 我的狗總是在門口等我。

examples.english: The library is always quiet, so I can read there.
examples.chinese: 圖書館總是安靜的，所以我可以在那裡讀書。

examples.english: My best friend always shares her snacks with me.
examples.chinese: 我最好的朋友總是跟我分享她的點心。

examples.english: We usually go to the park on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我們通常週末去公園。

examples.english: It usually rains a lot in summer here.
examples.chinese: 這裡夏天通常會下很多雨。

examples.english: They usually finish their homework before dinner.
examples.chinese: 他們通常在晚餐前完成作業。

examples.english: My cat sometimes sleeps on my bed all day.
examples.chinese: 我的貓有時候一整天都睡在我的床上。

examples.english: The weather is usually warm, but sometimes it gets cold.
examples.chinese: 天氣通常很溫暖，但有時候會變冷。

examples.english: If you are tired, sometimes you just need a good rest.
examples.chinese: 如果你累了，有時候你只需要好好休息。

examples.english: My brother seldom watches TV in the morning.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥早上很少看電視。

examples.english: She seldom misses school, even when she feels tired.
examples.chinese: 她很少缺課，即使她覺得累。

examples.english: I seldom read comic books because I prefer novels.
examples.chinese: 我很少看漫畫，因為我比較喜歡小說。

examples.english: She was excited because it was her birthday party.
examples.chinese: 她很興奮，因為那是她的生日派對。

examples.english: When I was little, my home was in Tainan.
examples.chinese: 當我還小的時候，我的家在台南。

examples.english: He was reading a comic book when his mom came home.
examples.chinese: 當他媽媽回家時，他正在看漫畫書。

examples.english: The children were playing in the park yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 孩子們昨天下午在公園裡玩耍。

examples.english: You were sad because your pet was sick.
examples.chinese: 你很傷心，因為你的寵物生病了。

examples.english: If I were rich, I would buy a big house.
examples.chinese: 如果我有錢，我就會買一棟大房子。

examples.english: I saw a small insect with colorful wings in the garden.
examples.chinese: 我在花園裡看到一隻有彩色翅膀的小昆蟲。

examples.english: Mosquitoes are a common insect that bites people in summer.
examples.chinese: 蚊子是一種夏天會叮人的常見昆蟲。

examples.english: Some insects are helpful to plants, like bees, for pollination.
examples.chinese: 有些昆蟲對植物有幫助，例如傳粉的蜜蜂。

examples.english: Bats fly in the sky at night to find food.
examples.chinese: 蝙蝠在晚上飛到空中找食物。

examples.english: Most bats sleep upside down in dark caves during the day.
examples.chinese: 大部分蝙蝠白天倒掛在黑暗的洞穴裡睡覺。

examples.english: Bats are mammals, and many of them eat insects.
examples.chinese: 蝙蝠是哺乳動物，其中許多吃昆蟲。

examples.english: Look at that beautiful butterfly on the flower!
examples.chinese: 看看那朵花上美麗的蝴蝶！

examples.english: The little caterpillar will become a beautiful butterfly.
examples.chinese: 小毛毛蟲會變成一隻美麗的蝴蝶。

examples.english: A butterfly gently landed on my hand in the garden.
examples.chinese: 一隻蝴蝶輕輕地落在花園裡我的手上。

examples.english: I saw a small spider climbing on the wall.
examples.chinese: 我看到一隻小蜘蛛在牆上爬。

examples.english: The spider built a beautiful web in the garden.
examples.chinese: 這隻蜘蛛在花園裡織了一個漂亮的網。

examples.english: My sister screamed when she saw a big spider.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐看到一隻大蜘蛛時尖叫了。

examples.english: The blue whale is the largest animal in the ocean.
examples.chinese: 藍鯨是海洋中最大的動物。

examples.english: We had a whale of a time playing in the park yesterday.
examples.chinese: 昨天我們在公園玩得非常開心。

examples.english: Whales can hold their breath for a long time underwater.
examples.chinese: 鯨魚可以在水下憋氣很長一段時間。

examples.english: The little white house sits on top of a green hill.
examples.chinese: 那棟白色小房子坐落在一座綠色小山頂上。

examples.english: We walked up the steep hill to see the beautiful sunset.
examples.chinese: 我們爬上那座陡峭的小山去看美麗的夕陽。

examples.english: Our town is surrounded by gentle hills, not high mountains.
examples.chinese: 我們的城鎮被平緩的丘陵環繞，而不是高山。

examples.english: Taiwan is a beautiful island in Asia.
examples.chinese: 臺灣是亞洲一個美麗的島嶼。

examples.english: Many people visit islands for summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 很多人會去島嶼度假。

examples.english: This small island has many special birds.
examples.chinese: 這個小島嶼有很多特別的鳥。

examples.english: She received a nice present on her birthday.
examples.chinese: 她生日收到一份很棒的禮物。

examples.english: He will present his project to the class tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 他明天將向全班同學提出他的專案報告。

examples.english: All students must be present in class on time.
examples.chinese: 所有學生都必須準時出席課堂。

examples.english: After elementary school, we go to junior high school.
examples.chinese: 讀完國小後，我們會上國中。

examples.english: Junior high school usually lasts for three years.
examples.chinese: 國中通常持續三年。

examples.english: I made many new friends in junior high school.
examples.chinese: 我在國中交了許多新朋友。

examples.english: She wants to improve her English, so she decided to take an advanced course.
examples.chinese: 她想提升她的英語能力，所以她決定選修一門進階課程。

examples.english: When the main course arrived, everyone thought the grilled fish looked delicious.
examples.chinese: 主菜上桌時，每個人都覺得烤魚看起來很好吃。

examples.english: We enjoyed the hiking trail, even though it was a challenging course for beginners.
examples.chinese: 我們很享受這條健行步道，儘管它對初學者來說是一條很有挑戰性的路線。

examples.english: Many people enjoy looking at beautiful art in the museum.
examples.chinese: 許多人喜歡在博物館欣賞美麗的藝術。

examples.english: We learn to draw and paint in our art class.
examples.chinese: 我們在美術課學習畫畫和塗色。

examples.english: Cooking delicious food is an art that takes practice.
examples.chinese: 煮出美味的食物是一門需要練習的藝術。
